Title: MISSION 1
Description: I have many animals on my farm. I live in an area where there is a frequent problem with black bears. I need to find where the bears are roaming so I can ensure my crops and animals are safe.

Title: MISSION 2
Description: A mayday call has gone out from a nearby vessel. Rescuers launch a drone to provide wider search coverage when arriving on the scene. Where are the life boats?

Title: MISSION 3
Description: Campus security has called emergency services. Trucks have been dispatched. Security needs to send a team to meet the trucks and wants to know from which direction they are approaching. Find the inbound emergency vehicles.
